thread.title: Are 2016 Olympics on Bella Hadid’s mind?
thread.title_full: Are 2016 Olympics on Bella Hadid’s mind? | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Are 2016 Olympics on Bella Hadid’s mind?
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter After walking in her sister Gigi Hadid’s footsteps in the fashion industry, Bella Hadid is trying to make a name for herself in something else.
The 18-year-old model Bella Hadid, who is an award-winning nationally-ranked equestrian, recently revealed she is so passionate about horse riding that she is training to compete in the 2016 Olympics, reports E! Online.
Talking about her love for horses, the model said that her devotion stemmed from her mother’s love for horses and added that she has been riding ever since she could walk.
First Published on October 01, 2015 5:00 pm
